Package org.wmn4j.analysis.harmony

Class ChromagramBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.analysis.harmony.ChromagramBuilder
  • public final class ChromagramBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for Chromagram instances.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChromagramBuilder()
      Constructor that creates a builder that adds to the pitch class bins based on count of notes or pitch classes.
      ChromagramBuilder​(java.util.function.Function<Note,​java.lang.Double> weightFunction)
      Constructor that creates a builder that adds to the pitch class bins using the given weight function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChromagramBuilder

        public ChromagramBuilder()
        Constructor that creates a builder that adds to the pitch class bins based on count of notes or pitch classes. For example, adding a note with the pitch class C to builder created with this constructor will increment the value of C by 1.0.

      • ChromagramBuilder

        public ChromagramBuilder​(java.util.function.Function<Note,​java.lang.Double> weightFunction)
        Constructor that creates a builder that adds to the pitch class bins using the given weight function.

        When adding a note to the builder the value that is added for the corresponding pitch class is the value returned by the specified weight function. The weight function must produce only non-negative values.

        Parameters:
        weightFunction - the weight function used for computing the non-negative weight of a notes's pitch class

    • Method Detail

      • durationWeight

        public static java.lang.Double durationWeight​(Note note)
        Returns a weight value for the note that is the double value of its duration.
        Parameters:
        note - the note for which the weight is returned
        Returns:
        a weight value for the note that is the double value of its duration

      • setValue

        public void setValue​(PitchClass pc,
                     double value)
        Sets the value for the given pitch class.
        Parameters:
        pc - the pitch class for which the value is set
        value - a non-negative value to set for the pitch class

      • add

        public void add​(Chord chord)
        Increments the values for the the pitch classes of the notes in the given chord. If a weight function is specified, then the added values are provided by the weight function.
        Parameters:
        chord - chord for which the pitch classes of the notes are incremented

      • add

        public void add​(Note note)
        Increments the value of the pitch class of the note. If a weight function is specified, then the added value is provided by the weight function.
        Parameters:
        note - note for which the pitch class is incremented

      • build

        public Chromagram build()
        Returns a chromagram with the values set in this builder.
        Returns:
        a chromagram with the values set in this builder
